text: An outdoor sculpture of Roscoe Conkling by John Quincy Adams Ward is installed near Madison Avenue and 23rd Street in Madison Square Park in Manhattan, New York. ==See also== * 1893 in art ==References== ==External links== * Category:1893 establishments in New York (state) Category:1893 sculptures Category:Bronze sculptures in Manhattan Category:Monuments and memorials in Manhattan Category:Outdoor sculptures in Manhattan Category:Sculptures of men in New York City Category:Statues in New York City Category:Flatiron District
title: Statue of Roscoe Conkling
